alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:05PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, northern Ascension, northeastern St. James, southwestern St. Helena, Livingston and eastern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 1230 PM CDT... At 1205 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over French Settlement, or 7 miles northeast of Gonzales, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Gonzales, Walker, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Springfield, Old Jefferson, Watson, Prairieville, Shenandoah, Whitehall and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 168 and 175. Interstate 12 between mile markers 8 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
